PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy outlines how we handle your data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
PrivacyPolicy.section1Content: We collect information necessary to provide tax simulation and accounting services, including but not limited to income details and expense categorization.
PrivacyPolicy.section2Content: Your data is used solely for generating accurate tax simulations and providing the services you requested. We do not sell your data to third parties.
PrivacyPolicy.section3Content: We use industry-standard encryption to protect your sensitive financial information. As per GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, or delete your personal data at any time.
